title: Calories in In-N-Out Fries
meta_description: Learn the calories in In-N-Out fries for a regular order, including carbs, fat, protein, sodium, and full nutrition details with tweaks and FAQs.
assumptions: Regular order of french fries from In-N-Out Burger, cooked in 100% peanut oil, no added toppings or sauces.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, portion size, and customizations; check In-N-Out's official info or app for latest values.

quick_answer.text: A regular order of In-N-Out fries contains 395 calories and 6 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Animal style (add cheese, grilled onions, and sauce)
Well done (extra crisp, minimal oil difference)

faqs.q: How many calories in In-N-Out fries?
What are the carbs in In-N-Out fries calories breakdown?
faqs.a: 54 g total carbs, including 5 g fiber and 0 g sugars per order.

faqs.q: How much fat and protein in In-N-Out fries?
faqs.a: 18 g total fat (5 g saturated) and 6 g protein per regular order.

faqs.q: Are In-N-Out fries high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, about 260 mg sodium per order, mostly from seasoning.
No cholesterol (0 mg) since they're cooked in peanut oil without animal products.
